Reviews.Content: very old, poor management it's really not worth, we really could have a better hotel for the rate we paid, actually we want to spend our new year eve at kuta or legian, but it was no room left. So we had the only choice at Perdana Dadi. My goodness I wont be back there for any reason, the rooms are in the very poor condition, old bed [--], old furniture, smelts tobacco and something else... the bathroom, better not describe. Guys, avoid this one.
Reviews.Author: marala
